content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Company obtains most of your personal data through the forms and applications that you fill out in connection with your employment or its termination, for example, if you fill out a job application. In addition, the Company may obtain personal data about you from other sources, for example, the results of background checks to the extent permitted by applicable law. \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
